backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, slot settings, pricing rules, and adminâ€‘protected slot blocking with access control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and tests with high confidence flags.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and layout behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, theme, React Query provider, and global error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin calendar showing bookings, blocked slots, and slot details with date selection and data fetching.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlockSlots: Dialog allowing admins to block or unblock slots with reason input and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/EarningsTr: Displays daily and weekly earnings for a selected date using date pickers and earnings query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/EmergencyO: Provides a form to reset ownership using an emergency code with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingRul: Fetches and updates pricing rules, allowing admins to edit rates and floodlight hours via a form.
frontend/src/components/admin/SlotSettin: Manages slot timing settings, enabling updates to opening hours, closing hours, and slot duration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessRestr: Renders an access restriction message for non-admin users with navigation back to the booking page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Toggles user authentication through Internet Identity, handling login, logout, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards admin routes by enforcing authentication, admin checks, and user profile completion.
frontend/src/components/customer/Availab: Renders a list of available time slots with formatted time and price, allowing users to select a slot.
frontend/src/components/customer/Booking: Displays a booking form that gathers user details, handles authentication, and submits booking requests.
Shows a summary card with selected date, time, sport, and total price before confirmation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and route outlet handling user/admin navigation.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Implements an error boundary that displays an error message and reload option when the app crashes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login handling, and context setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, ownership actions, and booking-related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom light/dark theme CSS variables with a neon-accent dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for calendar, settings, and earnings management.
Handles admin authentication, ownership claiming, and redirects based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Displays booking confirmation details or errors based on booking ID lookup.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Lets customers pick a date, view available slots, calculate pricing, and book a timeslot.
frontend/src/pages/customer/PaymentPlace: Shows a placeholder explaining upcoming payment integration and leads to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/ReceiptLooku: Allows users to enter a booking ID and navigate to the receipt/confirmation page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including feature requests and configuration for implementing an emergency ownership reset code set to 73024141.
